subtitleNullable: Top Animes from MyAnimeList collected using web scraping
descriptionNullable:
**Description:**

This dataset contains information on top anime collected from the MyAnimeList website. It includes a variety of attributes that describe each anime in detail, making it useful for analysis and research on anime trends, ratings, and other related factors.
*****
**Columns:**

| Column Name       | Type    | Description                                                |
|-------------------|---------|------------------------------------------------------------|
| Japanese          | str     | The original Japanese title of the anime.                  |
| Type              | str     | The format of the anime (e.g., TV, Movie, OVA, etc.).      |
| Episodes          | int     | The total number of episodes.                              |
| Status            | str     | The current status of the anime (e.g., Finished Airing, Currently Airing, etc.). |
| Aired             | str     | The date range during which the anime aired.               |
| Premiered         | str     | The season and year when the anime premiered.              |
| Producers         | str     | Companies involved in the production of the anime.         |
| Licensors         | str     | Companies that have licensed the anime for distribution.   |
| Studios           | str     | The animation studios responsible for producing the anime. |
| Source            | str     | The original source material of the anime (e.g., Manga, Light Novel, Original, etc.). |
| Genres            | str     | The genres associated with the anime.                      |
| Duration          | str     | The duration of each episode.                              |
| Rating            | str     | The age rating for the anime (e.g., PG-13, R, etc.).       |
| Score             | float   | The average score given by users.                          |
| Ranked            | int     | The ranking of the anime based on its score.               |
| Popularity        | int     | The popularity ranking based on the number of members.     |
| Members           | int     | The number of users who have added the anime to their list.|
| Favorites         | int     | The number of users who have marked the anime as a favorite.|
| Description       | str     | A brief description or synopsis of the anime.              |
| Name              | str     | The main title of the anime.                               |
| English Name      | str     | The English title of the anime (if available).             |
| Recommended       | int     | The number of users who have recommended the anime.        |
| Mixed Feelings    | int     | The number of users who have mixed feelings about the anime.|
| Not Recommended   | int     | The number of users who do not recommend the anime.        |
| Themes            | str     | The themes present in the anime.                           |
| Demographics      | str     | The target demographic for the anime (e.g., Shounen, Seinen, etc.). |
| Seasonal          | str     | The seasonal category of the anime (e.g., Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter). |
| Synonyms          | str     | Alternative names or titles for the anime.                 |

****

**Additional Information:**
- **Data Collection Method:** The data was collected by web scraping the MyAnimeList website, specifically from the top anime section.
- **Data Usage:** This dataset can be used for various purposes, such as analyzing trends in anime, comparing ratings and popularity, exploring the impact of different genres and themes, and conducting sentiment analysis based on user recommendations and reviews.

*****

**Notes:**
- Some fields may contain missing or null values if the information was not available on the website at the time of scraping.
- The dataset reflects the information available on MyAnimeList at the time of data collection and may not include the most recent updates or changes.

*****
**Source URL:** [MyAnimeList Top Anime](https://myanimelist.net/topanime.php)
